raw_mentions:
Racemic halofenic acid inhibited CYP 2C9 activity with an IC50 of 0.45 μM and (+) halofenic acid inhibited CYP 2C9 with an IC50 of 0.22 μM.
In contrast, the (−) halofenic acid was 20-fold less potent with an apparent IC50 of 3.5 μM.
